paper_abstract: This paper deals with the problem of H-infinity filter design for nonlinear discrete-time systems with time-varying delays via T-S fuzzy model approach. Some delay-dependent conditions for fuzzy H-infinity filter are proposed in terms of linear matrix inequalities (LMIs), which produce a less conservative result. Finally, one numerical example is given to demonstrate the effectiveness and the benefits of the proposed method.
paper_title: FUZZY H-infinity FILTER DESIGN FOR NONLINEAR DISCRETE-TIME SYSTEMS WITH TIME-VARYING DELAYS
